question: Who were Pativedakas and Pulisani in the Mauryan administration?
option1: They functioned as special reporters of the Amatya
option2: They functioned as special reporters of the Chanakya
option3: They functioned as special reporters of the king
answer: They functioned as special reporters of the king
explanation: In the Arthashastra of Kautilya there is mention of Pativedakas and Pulisani who functioned as special reporters of the King. They kept the King informed of public opinion.
